verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G3778><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> when the number <S%G4129><s%> of the disciples <S%G3101><s%> was multiplying, <S%G4129><s%> a complaint <S%G1112><s%> arose <S%G1096><s%> from the Hellenists <S%G1675><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> the Hebrews, <S%G1445><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> their <S%G846><s%> widows <S%G5503><s%> were neglected <S%G3865><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the daily <S%G2522><s%> service. <S%G1248><s%>

The <S%G1161><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> summoned <S%G4341><s%> the multitude <S%G4128><s%> of the disciples <S%G3101><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "It is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> appropriate <S%G701><s%> for <S%G2641><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> to forsake <S%G2641><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and serve <S%G1247><s%> tables. <S%G5132><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> select from among you, <S%G5216><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> men <S%G435><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> good report, <S%G3140><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we may appoint <S%G2525><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> business. <S%G5532><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> will continue steadfastly <S%G4342><s%> in prayer <S%G4335><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in the ministry <S%G1248><s%> of the word. <S%G3056><s%>"

These <S%G2532><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> pleased <S%G700><s%> <S%G1799><s%> the whole <S%G3956><s%> multitude. <S%G4128><s%> They <S%G2532><s%> chose <S%G1586><s%> Stephen, <S%G4736><s%> a <S%G1799><s%> man <S%G435><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> Philip, <S%G5376><s%> Prochorus, <S%G4402><s%> Nicanor, <S%G3527><s%> Timon, <S%G5096><s%> Parmenas, <S%G3937><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Nicolaus, <S%G3532><s%> a proselyte <S%G4339><s%> of Antioch; <S%G491><s%>

whom <S%G3739><s%> they set <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the apostles. <S%G652><s%> When <S%G2532><s%> they had prayed, <S%G4336><s%> they laid <S%G2007><s%> their hands <S%G5495><s%> on them. <S%G846><s%>

The <S%G2532><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> increased <S%G837><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of the disciples <S%G3101><s%> multiplied <S%G4129><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> exceedingly. <S%G4970><s%> A <S%G3793><s%> great <S%G4970><s%> company <S%G3793><s%> of the priests <S%G2409><s%> were obedient <S%G5219><s%> to the faith. <S%G4102><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Stephen, <S%G4736><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> power, <S%G1411><s%> performed <S%G4160><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> wonders <S%G5059><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the people. <S%G2992><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> those who <S%G3588><s%> were of <S%G1537><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> "The Libertines, <S%G3032><s%>" and <S%G2532><s%> of the Cyrenians, <S%G2956><s%> of the Alexandrians, <S%G221><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G575><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> of Cilicia <S%G2791><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Asia <S%G773><s%> arose, <S%G4802><s%> disputing with Stephen. <S%G4736><s%>

They <S%G2532><s%> weren't <S%G2480><s%> <S%G3756><s%> able <S%G2480><s%> to withstand <S%G436><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> by which <S%G3739><s%> he spoke. <S%G2980><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> they secretly induced <S%G5260><s%> men <S%G435><s%> to say, <S%G3754><s%> "We have heard <S%G191><s%> him <S%G846><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> blasphemous <S%G989><s%> words <S%G4487><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>"

They <S%G5037><s%> stirred up <S%G4787><s%> the people, <S%G2992><s%> the <S%G2532><s%> elders, <S%G4245><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the scribes, <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> came against <S%G2186><s%> him and <S%G2532><s%> seized <S%G4884><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> brought <S%G71><s%> him in to <S%G1519><s%> the council, <S%G4892><s%>

and <S%G5037><s%> set up <S%G2476><s%> false <S%G5571><s%> witnesses <S%G3144><s%> who said, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G444><s%> never <S%G3756><s%> stops <S%G3973><s%> speaking <S%G2980><s%> blasphemous <S%G989><s%> words <S%G4487><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the law. <S%G3551><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we have heard <S%G191><s%> him <S%G846><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth <S%G3480><s%> will destroy <S%G2647><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> place, <S%G5117><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will change <S%G236><s%> the customs <S%G1485><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> to us. <S%G2254><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> All <S%G537><s%> who sat <S%G2516><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the council, <S%G4892><s%> fastening <S%G816><s%> their eyes on <S%G1519><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> his <S%G846><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> like it was <S%G5616><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%> of an angel. <S%G32><s%>
